charter: Quarterly council of Lil Footsteps parents that co-designs childcare services, reviews impact data, and nominates policy priorities.

membership.selection_process: Participants nominated by case managers and voted in by active families using ranked-choice ballots.

meeting_cadence.location: Mosaic Cooperative Hub + encrypted video bridge

feedback_channels: Bi-weekly Signal check-ins moderated by the Parent Liaison
Anonymous suggestion locker collected at the daycare campus
Post-session public summaries archived in docs/parent_council_summaries

themes: Extended evening care for hospitality workers
Child wellness screenings and referral warm hand-offs
